<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 10"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Furious Sprint](/Feats.aspx?ID=5846) <actions string="Two Actions or Three Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Barbarian" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=813" />
<trait label="Rage" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=680" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 81 <sup>1.1</sup>

</column>

---

You rush forward. Stride up to five times, or up to eight times if you used 3 actions. All this movement must be in a straight line (though the GM might allow reasonable variance). You can replace any of these Strides with a [Balance](/Actions.aspx?ID=2369) action if you need to, which you attempt using an [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=36) check instead of an [Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=34) check, using the same DC.
name: Furious Sprint
